channel.title: Security on OpenClaw Advisors
channel.description: Recent content in Security on OpenClaw Advisors

item.title: 400 Malicious Skills Found on ClawHub: Why AI Agent Security Matters Now
item.description: Over 400 malicious skills were found on ClawHub stealing credentials and crypto. Here's what happened and how to protect yourself.

item.title: AI-to-AI Infection: The Security Threat Nobody's Talking About
item.description: AI agents interacting with other AI systems can get infected with prompt injections, leak secrets, or execute malicious code. This is the next frontier of cybersecurity â€” and most OpenClaw users aren't prepared.

item.title: Is Your OpenClaw Deployment Secure? 5 Things to Check Right Now
item.description: Most OpenClaw deployments are vulnerable out of the box. Check these 5 critical security items: exposed ports, default configs, tool permissions, secret management, and update hygiene.

item.title: OpenClaw vs NanoClaw: Security Comparison and What It Means for Your Business
item.description: NanoClaw hit 7K stars in 10 days with container isolation and minimal attack surface. Should you switch from OpenClaw? Or can OpenClaw be hardened to match NanoClaw's security?
